text: William Claude Dukenfield (January 29, 1880 - December 25, 1946) was an American actor, comedian, juggler and writer. == Trivia == *He is one of the famous people on the cover of the Beatles' Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band album. Category:1880 births Category:1946 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Pennsylvania
title: W. C. Fields
